attributes.action: Stop the privatisation of ALL police forces in the UK Immediately!
attributes.additional_details:
Stop this ludicrous idea which will inevitably lead to preferential arrests and preferential treatment not to mention corruption worse than we have now.

And how long before we get 'call out' charges and have to start paying for what was once free 'via our council taxes'?!

More worryingly, once privately owned, who will eventually be making the laws?
